title: Disaster Risk Communication: Effective Message Design Using 3D Visual Effects

context.prior_knowledge: Basic disaster management concepts and foundational communication theory knowledge
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education considering cognitive load issues that may arise when utilizing 3D visual effects in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain three core elements of disaster risk communication messages.
Learners can apply content design principles that minimize cognitive load when implementing 3D visual effects.
Learners can produce disaster scenario simulation videos using 3D visual effects tools compatible with smartphone environments.
Learners can analyze their created content according to peer evaluation criteria and suggest improvements.

resources: Free 3D Video Production Tools (e.g., CapCut, Canva)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
